movie.title: If I Forget
movie.description_intro: A play about the stories we choose to believe, the compromises we can't avoid and the hurt only our nearest and dearest can inflict.
movie.description_full: A play about the stories we choose to believe, the compromises we can't avoid and the hurt only our nearest and dearest can inflict.

movies.title: Nothing Like the Holidays
movies.summary: A Puerto Rican family living in the area of Humboldt Park in west Chicago face what may be their last Christmas together.
movies.description_full: A Puerto Rican family living in the area of Humboldt Park in west Chicago face what may be their last Christmas together.
movies.synopsis: A Puerto Rican family living in the area of Humboldt Park in west Chicago face what may be their last Christmas together.

movies.title: Extracted
movies.summary: A scientist who has invented a technology to construct virtual realities from people's memories finds himself in a perilous situation, after he reluctantly allows it to be used for a purpose he never imagined.
movies.description_full: A scientist who has invented a technology to construct virtual realities from people's memories finds himself in a perilous situation, after he reluctantly allows it to be used for a purpose he never imagined.
movies.synopsis: A scientist who has invented a technology to construct virtual realities from people's memories finds himself in a perilous situation, after he reluctantly allows it to be used for a purpose he never imagined.

movies.title: Restless
movies.summary: 1976:- Ruth Gilmartin (Michelle Dockery) visits her mother Sally (Charlotte Rampling) in rural Cambridgeshire and is amazed to learn she is a Russian refugee born Eva Delectorskaya, recruited as a spy by the British in 1939. After narrowly escaping death in the Netherlands, Eva (Hayley Atwell) is sent to America to seduce the married Mason Harding (Bertie Carvel), an adviser to the President, to find out if the Americans intend joining the war, a mission she successfully accomplishes. However, a second assignment is to supply a map to American agents supposedly outlining a planned German invasion of the States, but Eva spots errors in the map, informing her spy master and lover Lucas Romer (Rufus Sewell) and other colleagues. Though the map fools the President, Eva survives an attempt to kill her, and as her fellow spies die one by one, is convinced she was betrayed. Even in the 1970s, many years after the event, she believes her life is in danger and shocks Ruth by buying a shotgun ...

movies.title: Waves
movies.summary: Set against the vibrant landscape of South Florida, and featuring an astonishing ensemble of award-winning actors and breakouts alike, Waves traces the epic emotional journey of a suburban African-American family - led by a well-intentional but domineering father - as they navigate love, forgiveness and coming together in the aftermath of a loss. From acclaimed director Trey Edward Shults, Waves is a heartrending story about the universal capacity for compassion and growth even in the darkest of times.

From acclaimed director Trey Edward Shults, Waves is a heartrending story about the universal capacity for compassion and growth even in the darkest of times.
